text:
Cover image by AdobeStock & canva
加齢と共にたるんできた下腹部や脇腹が気になる人必見！ 今回は、体力に自信のない人や、初心者にもおすすめ、椅子を使って行なう簡単なお腹痩せエクササイズをご紹介します。 きついトレーニングで挫折してしまったあなた！ あきらめずに、もう一度チャレンジしてみませんか？
trans:
Cover image by AdobeStock & canva
Are you worried about sagging lower abs and flanks that come with aging? This article is a must-read! We are introducing simple belly-slimming exercises using a chair, perfect for those who lack confidence in their physical strength or are beginners. For those who have given up after struggling with tough workouts! Don't throw in the towel just yet, why not give it another try?
